name: Extreme Tulum Expedition
description:
Explore the Tulum Ruins, Beach, Jungle, Lake, Cenotes, Caribbean Sea and Coral Reef. Includes Zip Lining, Canoeing, Cliff diving and Snorkeling in the Jungle Lake, Blue Cenote, Visit the Tulum Beach Club and you may take a boat ride on the Caribbean Sea, where you will have the opportunity to snorkel in the Mesoamerican Barrier Reef System or Snorkel off the beach – visit to this location is contingent on having favorable weather and ocean conditions.
 
Includes a (4) course meal at “Oscar & Lalo Restaurant, Bar & Grill”, Snacks and Drinks throughout the day.
